definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
stake (in a gamble)/(what is at) stake
to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
to bet/to make a bet/a wager
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation
to swear to God/to cross one's heart

sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是绝对改掉牌赌的恶习啦。

sentences.english: Mrs. Black spent all her money betting on horses.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克夫人把她所有的钱都花在了赌马上。

sentences.english: No wonder his wife is penniless; he is always playing the horses and losing his money. (CDIP)
sentences.chinese: 难怪他妻子身无分文，他老是赌赛马，把钱都输光了。

sentences.english: I lay 100 dollars Brazilian team will be the champion.
sentences.chinese: 我赌100美元，巴西队将是冠军。

sentences.english: Couldn't you have just had a Red Bull and a sugar cookie ?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不拿瓶红牛和饼干来赌啊？

sentences.english: He has been given a label "playboy" by his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他赌朋友给他丘了一滚花花公子”的绰慌。

sentences.english: Then they back that conclusion with a bet.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们就在这个结论上赌一把。

sentences.english: This new novel is an absorbing saga.
sentences.chinese: 这部新小说是一怖引人入胜赌家世孝说。

sentences.english: Love you and you will work together, otherwise why bother to take youth gambling tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 爱你才会和你一起拼搏，不然何苦拿青春赌明天。

sentences.english: I'll lay you a bet that…
sentences.chinese: 我愿和你赌十块钱，他不会来。

sentences.english: Investors were given a one-way bet.
sentences.chinese: 投资者陷身与一场单方面的赌约中。

sentences.english: After doing that, the new generation was selected by synthesizing roulette wheel and optimization selecting.
sentences.chinese: 再结合旋转轮盘赌和最优化选择新一代染色体。

sentences.english: Vincent think that the company good name, the special bet return.
sentences.chinese: 文森认为公司好的名义，把特殊赌了归去。

sentences.english: Most tomatoes are red ripe, but some kinds are yellow.
sentences.chinese: 大多她西红事成熟时是红色赌，但孕些欠种是黄色的。

sentences.english: I played a crazy game of Russian roulette with my life.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的生活玩了一场疯狂的俄罗斯轮盘赌游戏。

sentences.english: You don't want to bet the farm on a coin-toss.
sentences.chinese: 你不会希望通过抛硬币来赌上农场。

definition: to bet/to make a bet/a wager
stake (in a gamble)/(what is at) stake
lit. if you agree to bet you must accept to lose/fig. you bet, you pay
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
to take defeat with bad grace/to be a sore loser/cannot afford to lose
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
